Module org.crudeemail

Class MailTreeItem<String>

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<String>
org.crudeemail.mail.MailTreeItem<String>
Type Parameters:
String -
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class MailTreeItem<String>
extends javafx.scene.control.TreeItem<String>

MailTreeItem

Class for handling messages in the folders from treeView to the tableView. Extended from original JavaFX TreeItem.
